arStrings.szText: {icon:Marker_Dungeon_Seasonal, 2.0} {c_highlight}Malignant tunnels{/c} each have a specific type of {c_highlight}malignant enemy{/c}, and {c_highlight}outgrowths{/c} at the end that can be invoked to summon powerful foes.
{icon:MonsterAffix_Malignant, 2.0} Malignant enemies are more difficult than most other enemies, but will provide powerful rewards if slain and caged.
Salvaging caged hearts you don't need will produce {c_highlight}ichor{/c} that can be used to craft new hearts, or invokers for use in malignant tunnels.
A caged heart can't be removed once socketed, but another heart can take its place. {c_highlight}The replaced heart will be lost.{/c}
{c_highlight}Brutal{/c} {icon:MonsterAffix_Malignant, 2.0} malignant enemies generate a barrier periodically.
{c_highlight}Vicious{/c} {icon:MonsterAffix_Malignant, 2.0} malignant enemies attack more quickly than other monsters of their type.
{c_highlight}Devious{/c} {icon:MonsterAffix_Malignant, 2.0} malignant enemies will occasionally damage your class resource.
{c_highlight}Wrathful{/c} {icon:MonsterAffix_Malignant, 2.0} malignant enemies are the rarest and most powerful malignant, and will infect you with a detonating shadow corruption.

{c_highlight}Seasonal items{/c} only last the current season. Seasonal characters will be moved to the {c_highlight}eternal realm{/c} when the current season ends. You keep your all your gear and currency except {c_highlight}malignant-related items{/c}.
Follow the season quest mark in the {icon:Quest_Season_Available, 2.0} map or {icon:Quest_Season_Progress, 2.0} journal to explore seasonal content.
Malignant sockets are aligned with {c_highlight}brutal{/c}, {c_highlight}vicious{/c}, or {c_highlight}devious{/c} malignant hearts. {c_highlight}Wrathful{/c} hearts can fit any malignant socket.
You can only benefit from one {c_highlight}wrathful{/c} {icon:MonsterAffix_Malignant, 2.0} caged heart at a time.
When {c_highlight}socketed caged hearts{/c} have the same powers, you can only benefit from the more powerful one. Lesser powers will be {c_highlight}inactive{/c}.
The {c_highlight}season journey{/c} can be found in the {c_highlight}seasons{/c} tab in the {c_highlight}menu{/c}.

Be sure to have an {c_highlight}invoker{/c} aligned with the {c_highlight}malignant tunnel{/c} you plan to visit. Invokers can be crafted at {c_highlight}Cormond's workbench{/c} or found from {c_highlight}elite{/c} monster kills.
Choosing to {c_highlight}extract{/c} a {c_highlight}legendary aspect{/c} from an item with a {c_highlight}socketed caged heart{/c} will irrevocably {c_highlight}destroy{/c} that heart.
{c_highlight}Gems{/c} can fit any {c_highlight}malignant socket{/c}, but must be removed at a {c_highlight}jeweler{/c} to make room for a {c_highlight}malignant heart{/c}.
